filmography.title: The Petrified Forest
filmography.role_description: A notorious, world-weary gangster on the run who holds the patrons of a remote Arizona diner hostage.
filmography.plot: A drifting intellectual and a gangster on the run cross paths at a lonely diner in the Arizona desert, leading to a tense standoff.

filmography.title: Black Legion
filmography.role_description: A factory worker passed over for a promotion who is seduced into joining a violent, xenophobic vigilante group.
filmography.plot: A man's resentment over losing a promotion leads him to join a secret hate group, destroying his life and family.
filmography.awards: National Board of Review: Win – Best Acting

filmography.title: Dead End
filmography.role_description: A notorious gangster who returns to his childhood slum neighborhood, only to be rejected by his mother and former girlfriend.
filmography.plot: The lives of a gang of street urchins, a struggling architect, and a returning gangster intersect in the New York City slums.

filmography.title: Marked Woman
filmography.role_description: A crusading district attorney determined to bring down a powerful mob boss by convincing his intimidated hostesses to testify.
filmography.plot: A nightclub hostess agrees to testify against her gangster boss after he murders her younger sister.

filmography.title: Angels with Dirty Faces
filmography.role_description: A crooked and treacherous lawyer who manages the affairs of a gangster but plots to double-cross him.
filmography.plot: A priest tries to stop a gangster from corrupting a group of street kids, while the gangster seeks revenge on his dishonest associates.

filmography.title: The Roaring Twenties
filmography.role_description: A sadistic and ruthless bootlegger who goes into business with a war buddy but eventually betrays him.
filmography.plot: Three men meet in a foxhole during World War I and face different destinies when they return home to Prohibition-era America.

filmography.title: They Drive by Night
filmography.role_description: A hard-working independent trucker who loses an arm in a crash and struggles to maintain his dignity and livelihood.
filmography.plot: Two brothers struggle to make a living as truck drivers, but their lives are complicated by accidents and a murder accusation.

filmography.title: High Sierra
filmography.role_description: An aging, pardoned gangster who agrees to one last heist in the mountains but finds himself out of place in a changing world.
filmography.plot: After being released from prison, a notorious thief is hired to rob a luxury resort, but the job goes wrong and he flees into the Sierra Nevada mountains.

filmography.title: The Maltese Falcon
filmography.role_description: A cynical, hard-boiled private investigator who gets entangled in a dangerous quest for a priceless statuette.
filmography.plot: A private detective takes on a case that involves him with three eccentric criminals, a gorgeous liar, and their quest for a priceless statuette.

filmography.title: All Through the Night
filmography.role_description: A New York gambler with a patriotic streak who stumbles upon a Nazi spy ring after his favorite baker is murdered.
filmography.plot: A gambler and his cronies uncover a Nazi fifth-column organization in New York City and decide to take matters into their own hands.

filmography.title: Across the Pacific
filmography.role_description: A disgraced Army officer who poses as a traitor to infiltrate a Japanese spy ring in Panama just before WWII.
filmography.plot: An American agent pursues Axis spies on a Japanese freighter bound for Panama on the eve of World War II.

filmography.title: Casablanca
filmography.role_description: A cynical American expatriate nightclub owner in Morocco who must choose between his love for a woman and helping her husband escape the Nazis.
filmography.plot: A cynical American expatriate struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape the Nazis in French Morocco.

filmography.title: Action in the North Atlantic
filmography.role_description: A tough and dedicated first officer in the Merchant Marine who battles German U-boats to deliver vital supplies.
filmography.plot: A Merchant Marine ship is torpedoed, but the survivors refuse to give up and sign on to a new Liberty ship to get supplies to Russia.

filmography.title: Sahara
filmography.role_description: A commanding American tank sergeant who leads a motley group of Allied soldiers to defend a desert well against a German battalion.
filmography.plot: After the fall of Tobruk, a sergeant and his tank crew pick up a group of stragglers and try to defend a well against a German battalion.

filmography.title: To Have and Have Not
filmography.role_description: A fishing boat captain in Martinique who reluctantly gets involved in the French Resistance after falling for a young American drifter.
filmography.plot: During World War II, an American expatriate helps transport a French Resistance leader and his wife to Martinique while romancing a lounge singer.

filmography.title: The Big Sleep
filmography.role_description: A sharp-witted private detective hired by a wealthy family to resolve a blackmail case, only to find himself in a web of murder and deception.
filmography.plot: Private detective Philip Marlowe is hired by a rich family. Before the complex case is over, he's seen murder, blackmail, and what might be love.

filmography.title: Dead Reckoning
filmography.role_description: A paratrooper captain who investigates the mysterious disappearance and death of his war buddy, leading him to a dangerous femme fatale.
filmography.plot: A soldier runs away rather than receive a medal, and his buddy tracks him down and finds out he's been murdered.

filmography.title: Dark Passage
filmography.role_description: A man wrongly convicted of killing his wife who escapes prison and undergoes plastic surgery to hide his identity while seeking the real killer.
filmography.plot: A man convicted of murdering his wife escapes from prison and works with a young woman to prove his innocence.

filmography.title: The Treasure of the Sierra Madre
filmography.role_description: A down-on-his-luck American drifter in Mexico whose search for gold twists his mind into paranoia, greed, and madness.
filmography.plot: Two down-and-out Americans in 1920s Mexico join an old prospector in search of gold, but greed and paranoia threaten to destroy them.

filmography.title: Key Largo
filmography.role_description: A disillusioned WWII veteran visiting a friend's hotel in Florida who is forced to confront a notorious gangster holding them hostage during a hurricane.
filmography.plot: A man visits his war buddy's family hotel and finds a gangster running things. As a hurricane approaches, the two end up confronting each other.

filmography.title: In a Lonely Place
filmography.role_description: A volatile and cynical screenwriter who becomes the prime suspect in a murder case, testing the trust of the woman he loves.
filmography.plot: A potentially violent screenwriter is a murder suspect until his lovely neighbor clears him. However, she soon starts to have her doubts.

filmography.title: The African Queen
filmography.role_description: A gin-swilling, rough-around-the-edges riverboat captain who is persuaded by a prim missionary to attack a German warship.
filmography.plot: In WWI East Africa, a gin-swilling riverboat captain is persuaded by a strait-laced missionary to use his boat to attack a German warship.

filmography.title: Beat the Devil
filmography.role_description: An associate of a group of desperate con artists headed to Africa who tries to outwit them in this satirical take on the noir genre.
filmography.plot: A quartet of international crooks are stranded in Italy while their steamer is being repaired, engaging in various schemes and double-crosses.
filmography.awards: National Board of Review: Top Foreign Film

filmography.title: Sabrina
filmography.role_description: A serious, all-business tycoon who tries to divert a chauffeur's daughter from his playboy brother but ends up falling for her himself.
filmography.plot: A playboy becomes interested in the daughter of his family's chauffeur, but it's his more serious brother who would be the better man for her.

filmography.title: The Caine Mutiny
filmography.role_description: A strict naval captain whose mental instability and paranoia lead his officers to relieve him of command during a typhoon.
filmography.plot: When a U.S. Naval captain shows signs of mental instability that jeopardizes the ship, the First Officer relieves him of command and faces court martial for mutiny.

filmography.title: The Barefoot Contessa
filmography.role_description: A cynical, washed-up film director who discovers a Spanish dancer and molds her into a Hollywood star, narrating her tragic rise.
filmography.plot: A fictionalized story of the life and career of a Spanish sex symbol, told in flashbacks at her funeral by the men who knew her.

filmography.title: The Desperate Hours
filmography.role_description: An escaped convict and ruthless gang leader who takes a suburban family hostage in their own home.
filmography.plot: Three escaped convicts take a suburban family hostage while waiting for their getaway money to arrive.

filmography.title: The Harder They Fall
filmography.role_description: An unemployed sportswriter who compromises his ethics to work as a press agent for a fixed heavyweight boxer, his final film role.
filmography.plot: A down-on-his-luck sportswriter is hired by a shady promoter to hype a large but untalented boxer whose fights are fixed.
